revision.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/Marco Papavero|Marco Papavero]] ([[User talk:Marco Papavero|talk]]) to last revision by [[User:imported>M86|imported>M86]]
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer C20 |revision=v1.0 |series=AC750 |asin=B00KATWRIY |fcc_date=04/14/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7C20 |ic_id=8853A-C20 |pcb_id=2050500528 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64FVSIG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3R12E40CBF-8E |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7610E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|AC750 Wireless Dual Band Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/Archer-C20.html Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://www.tp-link.com/en/download/Archer-C20_V1.html Support page] (v1/v2/v4)
"2050500528" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
===Overview=== *Supports 802.11ac standard - the next generation of Wi-Fi *Simultaneous 2.4GHz 300 Mbps and 5GHz 433 Mbps :connections for 733 Mbps of total available bandwidth *2 external antennas provide stable omnidirectional signal :and superior wireless coverage
===See also=== *[[TP-LINK Archer C20 v1.x]] - AC750 Wireless Dual Band Router :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C20 TE7C20] (2015-04-14) 2x ant., 1x USB 2.0 port *[[TP-LINK Archer C20 v2.x]] - AC900 Wireless Dual Band Router :3T3R 2.4GHz (450Mbps) + 1T1R 5GHz (433Mbps) 3x ant. *[[TP-LINK Archer C20 v4.x]] - AC750 Wireless Dual Band Router :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C20V4 TE7C20V4] (2017-02-21) 3x ant., no USB port (v4.0) *[[TP-LINK Archer C1200 v2.x]] - AC1200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C1200V2 TE7C1200V2] (2017-02-23)
